summary: Design and deploy an automated loan origination workflow for gig economy workers leveraging platform API integrations. System must aggregate income data from multiple gig platforms (Uber, DoorDash, Upwork, Fiverr) with user consent, apply dynamic eligibility rules considering income volatility/consistency, perform KYC/AML/fraud checks, and ensure compliance with lending regulations. Key deliverables include UI/UX workflows, API integrations, eligibility engine with admin controls, and monitoring dashboards. Solution addresses financial inclusion by enabling loans for workers without traditional employment verification.
